h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Fine China Tea Bowl Location
content: At the end of this lowest level, just ahead of the stairs, you can find the statue and box with the Curios item in it.

At the end of this lowest level, just ahead of the stairs, you can find the statue and box with the Curios item in it.
